00013 import java.awt.*;
00014 import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
00015 import java.awt.event.ActionListener;

00017 import ScheatorController.MainController;
00022 public class MainTablePanel extends AbstractViewPanel {
00023 
00024     JTable mainTable;
00025     javax.swing.JButton upButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
00026     javax.swing.JButton downButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
00027     javax.swing.JButton saveButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
00028     private org.jdesktop.application.ResourceMap resourceMap;
00029     private javax.swing.ActionMap actionMap;
00030     private MainController controller;
00031     public Boolean tableEdited = false;
00032     MainTableModel mainTableModel;

00034     public MainTablePanel(MainController controller) {
00035 
00036         this.controller = controller;
00037         controller.addView(this);
00038         init();
00039 
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setTableEdited(Boolean tableEdited) {
00043         Boolean oldValue = tableEdited;
00044         this.tableEdited = tableEdited;
00045         firePropertyChange("tableEdited", oldValue, this.tableEdited);
00046     }
00047     
00048     public Boolean isTableEdited() {
00049         return tableEdited;
00050     }
00051 
00052 
00053     private void init() {
00054 
00055         javax.swing.JPanel panel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00056         javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel = new javax.swing.JPanel();
00057 
00058         this.resourceMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getResourceMap(MainTablePanel.class);
00059         this.actionMap = org.jdesktop.application.Application.getInstance(scheator.ScheatorApp.class).getContext().getActionMap(MainTablePanel.class, this);
00060 
00061         mainTableModel = new MainTableModel();
00062         mainTable = new JTable(mainTableModel);
00063 
00064         initTable(mainTable);
00065         mainTable.setFillsViewportHeight(true);
00066         JScrollPane scrollPanel = new JScrollPane(mainTable);
00067 
00068         panel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(panel, BoxLayout.X_AXIS));
00069         buttonPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(buttonPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));
00070 
00071         upButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("moveUp.text"));
00072         upButton.setName("moveUp");
00073         upButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveUp"));
00074         upButton.addActionListener(new ButtonListener());
00075         
00076         downButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("moveDown.text"));
00077         downButton.setName("moveDown");
00078         downButton.setAction(actionMap.get("moveDown"));
00079         downButton.addActionListener(new ButtonListener());
00080 
00081         saveButton.setText(resourceMap.getString("save.text"));
00082         saveButton.setName("save");
00083         saveButton.setAction(actionMap.get("save")); // NOI18N
00084 
00085         buttonPanel.add(upButton);
00086         buttonPanel.add(downButton);
00087         buttonPanel.add(saveButton);
00088 
00089         add(scrollPanel);
00090         add(buttonPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
00091 
00092         add(panel);
00093         setName("tablePane");
00094     }
00095     private JTable initTable(JTable table) {
00096 
00097         table.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
00098         table.setColumnSelectionAllowed(false);
00099         table.setRowSelectionAllowed(true);
00100         table.setFillsViewportHeight(true);
00101         table.setDragEnabled(true);
00102         table.setShowVerticalLines(false);
00103         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(0).setPreferredWidth(10);
00104         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(1).setPreferredWidth(100);
00105         table.getColumnModel().getColumn(2).setPreferredWidth(100);
00106 
00107         return table;
00108     }
00109 
00118     public void print() {
00119         try {
00120             mainTable.print();
00121         } catch (java.awt.print.PrinterException e) {
00122             System.err.format("Cannot print %s%n", e.getMessage());
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     @Action (enabledProperty = "tableEdited")
00127     public void save() {
00128         controller.scheduleEdited();
00129         setTableEdited(false);
00130     }
00131 
00132     @Action
00133     public void moveUp() {
00134         Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00135         if (row > 0) {
00136             controller.moveMatch(row, row - 1);
00137             setTableEdited(true);
00138         }
00139     }
00140 
00141     @Action
00142     public void moveDown() {
00143         Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00144         if (row < mainTable.getRowCount()-1) {
00145             controller.moveMatch(row, row + 1);
00146             setTableEdited(true);
00147         }
00148 }
00149 
00150     @Override
00151     public void modelPropertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt) {
00152 
00153     }
00154 
00155     class ButtonListener implements ActionListener {
00156         ButtonListener() {
00157 
00158         }
00159         public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00160             if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Up")) {
00161                 Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00162                 if (row > 0) {
00163                     mainTableModel.moveMatch(row, row - 1);
00164                     setTableEdited(true);
00165                 }
00166             }
00167             else if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Down")) {
00168                 Integer row = mainTable.getSelectedRow();
00169                 if (row < mainTable.getRowCount()-1) {
00170                     mainTableModel.moveMatch(row, row + 1);
00171                     setTableEdited(true);
00172                 }
00173             }
00174             else if (e.getActionCommand().equals("Save")) {
00175                 mainTableModel.save();
00176             }
00177         }
00178     }
00179 }
